creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: tree at L; woman at center with back to viewer, reaching toward a lower branch with the PR hand; seated figure at R
inscription:
Signature, Stamp

-- in graphite on verso: S. Ivy | L.D. 45 | 187
-- title in graphite on verso
markings: brown stamp on recto, bottom center: Carl Sachs, Lugt 634a
provenance: Carl Sachs, Lugt 634a, Breslau (until 1931; sale C. G. Boerner, Leipzig, November 6, 1931). John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Young Girl and Death, From Quarante Cliché-Glaces
